{"name": "Angels & Sparrows Community Table", "alternate_name": "", "description": "* Free seated meal each weekday.
* No qualification required.  
* Note:  *visitors who arrive between 12:40-1:00 p.m. will receive a to-go meal.*
* After eating lunch, visitors can take home groceries from our Marketplace (subject to availability). **Walk-up grocery shopping is not provided.
* We share a driveway with New Friendship Presbyterian Church at the intersection of Ramah Church Road & Old Statesville Road.  For reference, the church is located across the street from a 7-Eleven gas station.", "email": "", "url": "https://angelsandsparrows.org", "status": "active", "address": {"address_1": "510 North Old Statesville Road", "address_2": null, "city": "Huntersville", "state_province": "NC", "postal_code": "28078", "country": "US"}, "location": {"latitude": 35.4196906, "longitude": -80.8418961}, "phones": [{"number": "(704) 918-0122", "type": "voice"}], "regular_schedule": [{"weekday": "Monday", "opens_at": "15:00", "closes_at": "17:00"}, {"weekday": "Tuesday", "opens_at": "15:00", "closes_at": "17:00"}, {"weekday": "Wednesday", "opens_at": "15:00", "closes_at": "17:00"}, {"weekday": "Thursday", "opens_at": "15:00", "closes_at": "17:00"}, {"weekday": "Friday", "opens_at": "15:00", "closes_at": "17:00"}]}
